description: Try our easy to follow Pizza Pot Pies recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Chicken pie,Low saturated fat,High protein,Tomato,Low sugar,Chicken,Mushroom
name: Pizza Pot Pies Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat the oven to 220Â°C. Grease four 11/4cup capacity ramekins. Prepare pizza dough following packet directions, adding the oregano.

Heat oil in a frying pan over medium heat. Cook chicken, stirring occasionally, for 10 minutes or until browned. Transfer to a bowl. Add mushroom, onion and capsicum to pan and cook, stirring occasionally, for 8 minutes or until soft. Stir in flour and cook for 1 minute. Stir in stock and bring to boil. Return chicken to pan with olives and tomato. Season. Divide mixture among ramekins.

Divide dough into 4 equal portions. Roll out until large enough to cover ramekin. Lay over ramekins, brush with egg and sprinkle with cheese. Bake for 10 minutes or until golden. Garnish with parsley.
